column3: Traffic;PHNOM PENH:------ A car crashed at 1:40 am on March 30
column4: 2019 on the Chroy Changvar Bridge.------A Cambodian man with French roots had been driving the Toyota car in a state of extreme drunkenness before the crash
column5: but luckily there were no injuries.------CNE understands that the man in question is the owner of an eponymous  fancy French bistro in Phnom Penh
column6: which begins with the letter A.------ The local authorities immediately arrived at the scene
column7: and took the vehicle to the traffic office to be dealt with later.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/297127
